translations: n.反响，影响（repercussion 的复数形式）

phrs.translation: 反应, 反映, 响应, 反响
深远的影响, 正在翻译
指事件结束后残留的影响

sentences.sentence: The collapse of the company will have repercussions for the whole industry.
sentences.translation: 这家公司的垮台将会给整个行业造成间接的负面影响。

sentences.sentence: We know what important historical repercussions some of those voyages had.
sentences.translation: 我们知道了其中一些航海行动的重大历史影响。

sentences.sentence: It was an effort which was to have painful repercussions.
sentences.translation: 那是一个将产生沉痛后果的尝试。
